comments:
Nitin, can you please take a look at my fixes in JSPIndexing shutdown 
(form JSPCorePlugin stop method. See if I did thing in the right order with 
respect to taglib controller? I'm stilling seeing odd exceptions from it during
a shutdown. 

See
http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/downloads/drops/I-I20050627-200506270936/testResults/consolelogs/wtptestlog.txt

for messages such as 

 [java] !ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 2 2005-06-27 11:07:20.899
     [java] !MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in:
"org.eclipse.core.resources".
     [java] !STACK 0
     [java] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
org/eclipse/jst/jsp/core/internal/contentmodel/ITaglibRecordEvent
     [java] 	at
org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.contentmodel.TaglibIndex.createDescription(TaglibIndex.java:359)
     [java] 	at
org.eclipse.jst.jsp.core.internal.contentmodel.TaglibIndex$ResourceChangeListener.resourceChanged(TaglibIndex.java:212)
     [java] 	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager$2.run(NotificationManager.java:276)
     [java] 	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.run(InternalPlatform.java:1044)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:783)
     [java] 	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.notify(NotificationManager.java:270)
     [java] 	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.broadcastChanges(NotificationManager.java:144)
     [java] 	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.broadcastPostChange(Workspace.java:180)
     [java] 	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.endOperation(Workspace.java:914)
     [java] 	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.copy(Resource.java:541)
     [java] 	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.builder.BatchImageBuilder$4.visit(BatchImageBuilder.java:228)

The resource listeners are still in place (not removed) and processing the
workspace shutdown.

Added corresponding startup and shutdown methods to TaglibIndex class to ignore
any resource and classpath changes after notified of shutdown.
